item.title: Sorting items in a nested dictionary
item.description: Problem Statement: We want to sort items in a dictionary by a value that is nested deep in the dictionary. Let’s take an example: Dictionary to be sorted: dict_v = { "1": {"A":1}, "2": {"B":2}, "3": {"C":6}, "4": {"D":4} } Here, we want to sort the dictionary by the values 1,2,6 and 4. Let’s call “1”, “2”,“3”, “4” as key, “A”, “B”,“C”, “D” as field and 1,2,6,4 as values. We want to sort the dictionary by values and that also in descending order.
